messages.body: When comparing the current price to the book value of $EPR, it is valued rather cheaply. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/analyzer/stock/EPR?view=fundamental-analysis&key=2bec61a4-963b-46f5-b983-d106b28c78a6&utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=FA&utm_content=EPR&utm_campaign=social_tracking
$EPR 1 hr left to go, let’s go
$EPR ridiculous cheap, $26~$28 tomorrow
$EPR should I buy this or wait more?

$EPR The hits keep coming for this stock unfortunately. No one feels it more than those of us in around $65.Nothing to do but wait for the comeback. Not selling in my IRA, but this got brutalized from covid and the latest news today on more theaters closing. Since its temporary we should be ok. I do think next year when covid gets under control, folks will still want to go to the movies, go to Top Golfs, Zoos, concerts etc. I know I will. Until then we have to take the pain....and even consider averaging down for a better position long term. Hold the line guys!

$EPR for those thinking about today being an entry price, don’t. Wait until around $14 after AMC follows Regal’s suit and closes up shop. And then you’ll have to judge if it’s worth $14 after having lost 48% of their portfolio.

There’s one thing I say repetitively here and that is viruses just don’t disappear like a miracle. After a vaccine is founded it’ll be approximately 50% effective. It’ll take at the very least six months to manufacture. It’ll then take up to a year for distribution just within the country. And of course you’ll have the anti-vaxxers who will further reek havoc.

messages.body: $EPR load em up, then don't look until Q 2021

$EPR Sold a few $25 1/15 puts for $3.5.
$EPR it’s about time to cut my losses and move on from this horrible investment decision I made...
$EPR Love the pumpers on this board thinking it wouldn't drop below 30.
$EPR Unfortunately, This is going to get dramatically worse.

$EPR this stock is going to be a slower recovery than i had initially hoped.  Dividend won’t come back until movie theaters are back with actual new movies.  And that’s looking like not until spring 2021.  So maybe 3rd/4th quarter 2021.  Probably a 50%-75% cut in dividend once reinstated.  Still fairly safe at these levels but if you bought 40+ u might be underwater for longer than u would like.
$EPR add a few in the $25s
$EPR Not sure if I can wait it out any longer...this is rough
